snippet: Britain faces many challenges this year to its national identity. Will it emerge reinvigorated in a broadening Europe, or as a footnote to its onetime global reach?
lead_paragraph: Britain faces many challenges this year to its national identity. Will it emerge reinvigorated in a broadening Europe, or as a footnote to its onetime global reach?

headline.main: For Britain, Big Decisions on Identity
headline.print_headline: For Britain, Big Decisions on Identity
